Guide.Title: How To Play
Guide.Content: 1. Collect the seeds under the tree 2. Plant them in any farm plot 3. Fill up your water bucket by interacting with the well 4. Harvest crops when you see the green harvest icon above them 5. Collect the gold and seeds that appear 6. Spend the gold on upgrades or allies 7. When a wave starts, enemies will come to attack 8. Protect your Tree of Life from bandits at all costs!

Guide.Title: Hints and Tips
Guide.Content: -At any point during the next wave countdown, you can interact with the Keep board to skip the countdown -Should you somehow run out of seeds, more will periodically drop from your Tree of Life for you to pick up -If you are not gaining gold fast enough, try upgrading your harvest reward at the shop

Guide.Title: Inventory
Guide.Content: -Your inventory is displayed at the bottom-right corner -All collected water, seeds, and gold is stored here -Performing certain actions require a number of these items to be in your inventory -Walk over seeds and gold to pick them up automatically

Guide.Title: Player
Guide.Content: -Your health and stamina are displayed in the top right corner -When you are damaged by an enemy, your life will drain -When your life is depleted, you will die and have to respawn near your Keep -Every time you respawn, your respawn countdown will be increased by one second, up to a maximum of 20 seconds -When you perform actions like sprinting, jumping, and using a weapon, your stamina will be reduced

Guide.Title: Farming
Guide.Content: -With a seed in your inventory, look at a farm plot and press the E key to plant a crop -When you see the water icon appear over the crop, give it some water to keep it alive -When a crop is fully grown, harvest it for a reward of gold and more seeds -Dead crops can be removed in the same manner, but yield no reward Crop Timings: 30 seconds before they need water 45 seconds having water until they can be harvested

Guide.Title: Gold
Guide.Content: -Gold is rewarded from harvesting crops -It can be spent at the shop on upgrades or items -Placing gold in your Keep chest will queue up new allies to spawn during active rounds

Guide.Title: Enemy Waves
Guide.Content: -At set time intervals, a number of enemies will begin spawning at the enemy castle and walk toward your village to attack you, your allies, and your tree -Killing all enemies in a wave will trigger a new wave countdown -Complete all waves to win the game!

Guide.Title: Your Allies
Guide.Content: -While a round is active and your Keep chest is stocked with enough gold, allies will spawn every few seconds to help you out -The armor upgrade in the shop will make them more resilient to attacks -Purchasing either a sword or sheidl for yourself will also give newly spawned allies an item of the same type

Guide.Title: Your Tree of Life
Guide.Content: -The tree must survive every wave in order to win the game -If it dies, you lose the game and must restart from the beginning -You can heal your tree with extra seeds from your inventory Tree Info: Max tree health is 1000 hitpoints One seed will heal the tree for 2 hitpoints

Guide.Title: Upgrade Shop
Guide.Content: -Buying upgrades will enhance your survivability and crop productivity -The harvest reward upgrade increases the gold and seed yield of crops -The water bucket upgrade allows you to carry more water to keep your crops irrigated -The ally armor upgrade will increase the max health of your allies -The restore health potion will simply refill your health

Guide.Title: Sword and Shield
Guide.Content: -Purchasing a sword or shield will place that item in your hand, and give you better offensive or defensive power -The newly purchased item will also spawn allies with an item of the same type
